duties_responsibilities.duty: Grading products for quality control and preparing products for shipment by repacking into smaller increments.
Assembling boxes, labels, stacks, and stock packages for shipment.
Cleaning and sanitizing work area while adhering to sanitation and safety procedures for handling and production of tomatoes according to safe quality food (SQF) standards.

education_certification.credential: Prefer High School or GED but not required.
